title: Laborader
description: It's a sturdy,solid dog.Square in appearance,with a strong body and sturdy legs.It usually grows upto 24 inches.

title: German Shepherd
description: German Shepherd(a)Alsatian is a German breed.It is a working dog of medium to large size.It is a guide dog for the blind and a watchdog for police and military departments.stands 24 to 26 inches

title: Golden retriever
description: Golden Retriever is a Scottish breed of retriever dog of medium size.It is characterised by a gentle and affectionate nature.It has a golden coat to its body.Healthy adult typically stands between 20 to 24 inches

title: pug
description: Pug has a physically distinctive feature of a wrinkly,short-muzzled face and curled tail.Compact,square body with well developed and thick muscles all over the body.

title: Pomeranian
description: Pomerian is classed as a toy dog breed because of its small size.It is a sturdy,healthy dog.Pomeranians are small dogs weighing 1 to 3.5 Kgs

title: siberian husky
description: Siberian Husky has a double coat that is thicker than that of most other dog breeds.These are active, independent, mischievous, and playful.It grows about 20 to 24 inches.

title: Doberman
description: Dobermann has a long muzzle.It stands on its pads and is not usually heavy-footed.These are originally intended as guard dogs,so males typically have a muscular and intimidating appearance.Females are usually thinner, but should not be spindly.The ideal height of these vary from 25 to 27 innches

title: Rottweiler
description: Rottweiler is a breed of domestic dog, regarded as medium-to-large or large.The back is straight, strong and firm.These grows about 24 to 27 inches

title: Dalmatian
description: Dalmatian is a breed of medium-sized dog,,noted for its unique white coat marked with black or brown-colored spots.These are dogs with excellent endurance and stamina.These stands from 19 to 23 inches

title: Siamese
description: Siamese describes something of or related to Siam(now called Thailand).These are long,elegant cats.They have piercing baby blue eyes,large ears,and a coat that comes in four different shadesâ€”seal,chocolate,blue and lilac.

title: Persian
description: Persian cats have extremely long and thick coat,short legs,wide head with the ears set far apart,large eyes and an extremely shortened muzzle.

title: Siberian
description: Siberian cats are intelligent and exceptionally playful.This breed is known to be slow to mature,taking as long as five years to graduate from kitten-like antics.This means the Siberian cat is a lot of fun to have around.This breed loves to climb,explore and play.

title: Maine Coon
description: Maine Coons are heavily boned,muscular cat.Originally she was an outdoor cat,and later became a working breed who kept barns and homes clear of rodents.The head is large with tall ears.

title: Scottish Fold
description: Scottish Fold Cats are one of the most affectionate,attentive and intelligent cats in the world.The head is round and the folded ears heighten that illusion of roundness.The eyes are very round, bright and clear.

title: Himalayan Cat
description: The Himalayan cat is a breed or sub-breed of long-haired cats similar to the Persian,with the exception of its blue eyes and its point colouration,which were derived from crossing the Persian with the Siamese.Himalayan tends to have a round body and short legs,which makes it harder for them to jump as high as other cats do.

title: Soap
description: Soap is an ancient process which dates back almost 5000 years. It is made from a chemical reaction between natural oils and sodium hydroxide (NaOH) also known as caustic soda.
